0.text: Innate: Brand's abilities apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Subsequent abilities used against a target with Ablaze are empowered. Killing an enemy afflicted with Ablaze or with an ability restores 20 − 40 (based on level)  mana.
0.html: Innate: Brand's abilities apply a stack of Ablaze to enemies hit that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. Subsequent abilities used against a target with Ablaze are empowered. Killing an enemy afflicted with Ablaze or with an ability restores 20 − 40 (based on level)  mana.

1.text: Ablaze: While afflicted with Ablaze, the target is dealt「 2.5% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds 」「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds 」as magic damage. Ablaze deals 120% damage per tick to  monsters, capped at 80.
1.html: Ablaze: While afflicted with Ablaze, the target is dealt「 2.5% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds 」「 0.83% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds over 3.25 seconds 」as magic damage. Ablaze deals 120% damage per tick to monsters, capped at 80.

2.text: Upon applying 3 stacks of Ablaze to a large  monster or enemy  champion, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants  sight and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt 9% − 13% (based on level) of their maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) as magic damage and applied a stack of Ablaze. The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.
2.html: Upon applying 3 stacks of Ablaze to a large monster or enemy champion, the fire becomes unstable, forming an area around the target that grants sight and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all stacks. All enemies within the detonation are dealt 9% − 13% (based on level) of their maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) as magic damage and applied a stack of Ablaze. The explosion will still occur if the target dies to the ability applying the third stack or during the delay.

3.text: Brand cannot stack Ablaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.
3.html: Brand cannot stack Ablaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the last 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: Ablaze Bonus: The target is  stunned for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Ablaze Bonus: The target is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: After a 0.627 seconds delay, Brand erupts a pillar of flame at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: After a 0.627 seconds delay, Brand erupts a pillar of flame at the target location that deals magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Ablaze Bonus: The target takes 25% bonus damage.
1.html: Ablaze Bonus: The target takes 25% bonus damage.

0.text: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, which creates a blast that deals magic damage to them and nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, which creates a blast that deals magic damage to them and nearby enemies.

1.html: Ablaze Bonus: Conflagration spreads farther.

0.text: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.
0.html: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.

1.text: If Pyroclasm's current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to Brand even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.
1.html: If Pyroclasm's current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to Brand even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.

2.text: Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then Brand.
2.html: Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then any valid bounce target, then Brand.

3.text: The target does not have to be  visible for the fireball to bounce to them.
3.html: The target does not have to be visible for the fireball to bounce to them.

4.text: Ablaze Bonus: The target is  slowed for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
4.html: Ablaze Bonus: The target is slowed for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.

Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」
